summary:
Game of thrones 7° stagione Sansa Stark e Petyr Baelish 

Ho letto molte volte in giro di come Petyr fosse innamorato di Sansa....
caption:
Game of thrones 7° stagione Sansa Stark e Petyr Baelish

Ho letto molte volte in giro di come Petyr fosse innamorato di Sansa. Mi spiace, ma questo amore non lo vedo.

L'ha usata per i suoi scopi, manipolandola, facendola sentire sempre in debito, mettendo mano allo sterminio della sua stessa famiglia. Ogni cosa che ha fatto per Sansa è stato in funzione di se stesso o per avvantaggiarsi.
Non so dove la gente veda l'amore in tutto questo esattamente.

title: [SPOILERS] Robert and Rhaegar..
body:
So now after the seven seasons we’re clear of the fact that Robert’s rebellion was built on a lie. Rhaegar loved lyanna and they chose each other out of their own consent. But obviously, Robert was unaware of that. While reading the first book, i stumbled upon a conversation between Robert and Ned where Robert tells how much he hated Rhaegar and wanted to kill him a thousand times for kidnapping and raping Lyanna. But Ned of course knew the truth and just consoles his friend.

What if Robert would’ve known everything about the two lovers. Would he had still gone for a war? What do you guys think..



Source: https://ift.tt/2L5IPZe

summary:
Jojen: Well what do we do now?
Lilly: Get a kitten and name it Larry!
Jojen: We are not getting a kitten - honey will you please...
body:
Jojen: Well what do we do now?
Lilly: Get a kitten and name it Larry!
Jojen: We are not getting a kitten - honey will you please tell her?
Bran: I don't know, now I kind of want one. 
Jojen: Oh my god. 
Bran: Well think about it, we've been through a lot, maybe the presence of a little cuddly friend will help ease the pain. 
Jojen: So you have a child shaped hole in your heart and your plan is to cram a cat in there?
Bran: Yep.

dialogue.label: Jojen:
dialogue.phrase: Well what do we do now?

tags: it's way too late for me to be doing this
but I love it so much
summary: From the ‘Ashley likes Photoshop a little too much’ collection All of my solo works (current and upcoming): A Vow without Honor...
caption:
From the ‘Ashley likes Photoshop a little too much’ collection

All of my solo works (current and upcoming):

A Vow without Honor (in progress): 
“I made a promise to protect you. Honor or not, that is one I intend to keep.” - A story of a Lion and a Wolf, to beings brought together by the very same reasons that should have kept them apart.
Link
Fandom: Game of Thrones   OC: Myra Stark

Burn the Banners (upcoming):
She had been the proper lady: obeyed her parents, married the man they chose, bowed her head and kept quiet even as he brought their livelihood to ruin, but no more. 

For many, a pirate attack is the worst day of their lives, or their last, but for Jane Locke, it was her liberation. And they would all soon come to find that it wasn’t a bird they’d released form its cage, but a beast, and this world would be hers, one way or another.
Fandom: Black Sails   OC: Jane Locke 

Daughter of War (upcoming): 
Vigdis is the daughter of Tyr, God of War and famed Champion of Asgard. In her youth, she dreamed of following in her father’s footsteps and claiming the title of champion for herself, but as the prospective future Queen of Asgard, Vigdis has had to set aside her aspirations in order to perform her duty, and still the heart that yearns for the solemn watchman on the Bifrost.

But the days of peace in the Nine Realms are swiftly coming to an end, and war may no longer demand a god, but a goddess to sate its demands.
Fandom: Thor - Marvel   OC: Vigdis Tyrsdottir

Critical Mass (upcoming):
Her life has been dedicated to one thing: the First Order. DV-7892 (”Demo”) is a member of the infamous Knight Squadron, a unit of elite pilots personally overseen by General Hux. Ruthless, efficient, and unwavering, Knight Squadron made clear that the First Order’s presence in the Unknown Regions was a thing to be feared.

During a simple escort mission, Demo discovers what cargo Knight Squadron is delivering to the First Order and does the unthinkable: she disobeys. Hijacking the ship, Demo flees the Unknown Regions with the First Order hot on her heels. Seeing an opportunity, General Organa dispatches her best pilot to find the wayward trooper and bring her in.

However, one decision does not change 25 years’ worth of obedience, and Poe Dameron is going to learn very quickly that not all stormtroopers are so willing to accept his help.
Fandom: Star Wars   OC: DV-7892 - Demo

This should be everything from me, unless @chuck-hansens and I continue to provoke one another, in which case, I’ll have another by the end of the week.

Bonus: Ask me for a manip for your OCs. Seriously, I love making this stuff.

tags: robert baratheon is part of the targaryen family tree
summary: I Need Someone to Tell Me If I’m Wrong:
body:
I Need Someone to Tell Me If I’m Wrong:

But Robert Baratheon was fourth in line for the Iron Throne at the beginning of his Rebellion. Behind Rhaegar, Aegon (Elia’s son) and Viserys. [Point: Rhaenys should inherit before Viserys. History indicates this probably wouldn’t happen.]

Granted, I don’t think the Lords Paramount and other nobility would have just handed him the crown if the male Targaryen line suddenly died out.

It just bothers me that this isn’t discussed in terms of political thinking during the Mad Kong’s reign. It adds dimension to why Rickard would want to marry Lyanna to a lord who’s holding were do geographically removed from the North, to start. It underscores why Tywin didn’t move on Aerys even with all the provocation. It adds an element to Robert’s own psyche with his loathing of all things Targaryen. It bears factoring in.

‘ Prince Rhaegar shook his head. “My royal sire fears your father more than he does our cousin Robert. He wants you close, so Lord Tywin cannot harm him. I dare not take that crutch away from him at such an hour.” ‘
